meanings.definition: A type of antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed oxacillin to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: The hospital keeps a supply of oxacillin for treating patients.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the mighty oxacillin coming their way.
meanings.sent4: Oxacillin acted like a brave knight battling the bacterial invaders.
meanings.sent5: The powerful oxacillin wiped out the bacteria like a superhero saving the day.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a medication that belongs to the penicillin class of antibiotics.
meanings.sent1: My friend is allergic to oxacillin, so he can't take certain antibiotics.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained the difference between oxacillin and other antibiotics.
meanings.sent3: The penicillin family reunion was missing oxacillin, the cool cousin.
meanings.sent4: In the world of antibiotics, oxacillin stood out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The doctor praised oxacillin for its role in fighting infections, like a hero in a story.
